game.name: Mage & Maze
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Join this great wizard (or not-so-great) on his journey to find the exit of a mysterious dungeon in Mage & Maze.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join this great wizard (or not-so-great) on his journey to find the exit of a mysterious dungeon in Mage & Maze.
